item.title: Silent Boot Android
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: {{ youtube NuDiqttzrm4 {} I hate the carrier boot sound when restarting my phone. Here’s how to boot without hearing it. This video includes a Sponsored Message from Norton. Check out Norton’s The Most Dangerous Town Ep. 2 – http://full.sc/MDT-OSG
